mapper.select: select distinct b.* from step_book b inner join STEP_RECOMMEND r on b.id = r.book_id order by r.sort_index ASC

select b.book_name, b.author, b.cover_img, b.introduction, b.is_serialized, b.has_ending, r.id, r.recommend_type, r.sort_index from step_book b inner join STEP_RECOMMEND r on b.id = r.book_id order by r.sort_index ASC
